TopicTitle: Game launcher will state "Checking for updates..." but never allow me to launch.

Articles.Content:
Hey!

Long time on-again off-again player, rarely post, but I lurk a lot.

So, like the title says, the game launcher will state "Checking for updates..." but never allow me to launch the actual game. I am all updated (I cleared and reinstalled last night) and have no mods installed (never have). I run it in 32-bit. When I do reinstall, it works for one launch. If I close the program, it will never launch again.

I checked the stickied posts and did not readily find an answer.

Thanks for the help!

-Saej
Not sure exactly what's going on there, but you should be able to launch KSP using the KSP.exe directly, instead of running the Launcher.

Not sure exactly what's going on there, but you should be able to launch KSP using the KSP.exe directly, instead of running the Launcher.

Yep, worked!

Not sure why I didn't think of this, but I'm in.

Thanks a bunch!

-Saej
